channel.title: CVE Feed for YITH -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for YITH -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-45359|2024-08-03T14:09:56.765Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20gift%20cards
item.description: Unauth. Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability in YITH WooCommerce Gift Cards premium plugin <= 3.19.0 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-37943|2024-08-02T04:04:24.227Z -- yith -- yith%20woocommerce%20ajax%20product%20filter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in YITH YITH WooCommerce Ajax Product Filter allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects YITH WooCommerce Ajax Product Filter: from n/a through 5.1.0.
